1.location: South Ridge 5, South Ridge Towers, Downtown Dubai, Dubai
description: Brought to you by D&B Properties, this spacious 1 Bedroom Apartment is located in South Ridge Tower 5, Downtown Dubai for leasehold.
Will suit a young couple perfectly. The apartment has a dog friendly and a family friendly park opposite.
Contact our Downtown agent Ignatious Muhammad on
South Ridge is a six tower residential apartment complex in Downtown Dubai.
Close to Mohammed Bin Rashid Boulevard, the high-rise towers overlook the vibrant landscape of Old Town & Downtown Dubai.
South Ridge Tower is a development in Downtown Dubai Masterplan. The apartment benefits from a separate dining area, living area with Balcony, fitted kitchen, 1 bedroom with built in wardrobes.

South Ridge comprises one, two, three, and four bedroom apartments and penthouses with a multitude of amenities ranging from a swimming pool, children’s wading pool and play area, fully-equipped gymnasium.

23.location: Syann Park 1, Syann Park, Arjan, Dubai
description: Azco Real Estate Brokers (LLC) is proud to offer you this astonishing and elegantly designed apartment located in the most sought-after residential community in Dubai, Arjan.

Syann Park is a residential building in Arjan that offers 1, 2 and 3-bedroom apartments. This 7-storey mid-rise apartment building is a blend of Art Deco and Neo Romantic architecture. There are several popular educational institutes, sports complexes, medical centres and restaurants located nearby. It is a project by Syann Properties. Arjan is known as an eco-friendly community that utilizes renewable energy to maintain its needs. It consists of residential complexes, commercial towers and retail developments making it an ideal neighbourhood to live.
